contest-event.event-date:
March 7, 1976 D Oldham Contest (Section A)
Oldham Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oldham Contest oldham-contest-section-a
None
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and cup plus park engagement worth £60, 2nd £30 plus park engagement worth £30, 3rd £15, 4th £10. 5th annual contest organised by Oldham Borough Council. 13 bands competed.
May 20, 2013, 9:20 a.m. Dec. 19, 2016, 10:13 a.m.
1 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Brian Natton James Cook, Circumnavigator
2 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) Murray Slater
3 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Gordon Pulleyn
4 Linthwaite Silver Band Bob Lennon
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band Herbert H. Howarth
Unknown Result Burnley Alliance Silver Neville Rogerson

Unknown Result Marple Band M. McClean
